meanings.definition: A loud, blaring noise or fanfare.
meanings.sent1: The tantara of the trumpet signaled the start of the parade.
meanings.sent2: The tantara of the fire alarm woke up the entire building.
meanings.sent3: The tantara of the car horn startled the sleeping cat.
meanings.sent4: The tantara of the thunderstorm echoed through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The tantara of the school bell marked the end of the day.

meanings.definition: A noisy, confused situation or uproar.
meanings.sent1: The tantara of voices in the crowded market made it hard to hear.
meanings.sent2: The tantara of opinions in the meeting room led to a heated debate.
meanings.sent3: The tantara of toys scattered around the room made it look like a tornado hit.
meanings.sent4: The tantara of emotions in her mind felt like a whirlwind of chaos.
meanings.sent5: The tantara of colors in the painting created a vibrant and lively scene.
